content: छाग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (गी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Relating to a goat or she-goat; <ls>Y. 1. 258.</ls> --गः (गी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} A goat; ब्राह्मणश्छागतो यथा (वंचितः) <ls>H. 4. 53</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 269.</ls> {@--2@} The sign Aries of the zodiac. --गं {@--1@} The milk of a she-goat. {@--2@} An oblation.
